paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: progressive weakness in the distal parts of lower extremities, axonal sensorimotor polyneuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing of the patient, her older sister, son and daughter confirmed a pathogenic variant Chr18: 29178562, rs148538950, NM_000371.3:c.G368A:p. Arg123His in exon 4 of the transthyretin gene in a heterozygous state, consistent with hereditary TTR amyloidosis (hATTR).
Family members with an identified mutation are shown in red.
Family members with an identified mutation are shown in red.
Family members with an identified mutation are shown in red.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with hereditary TTR amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was confirmed through genetic testing in multiple family members.
key_quotes: Genetic testing of the patient, her older sister, son and daughter confirmed a pathogenic variant Chr18: 29178562, rs148538950, NM_000371.3:c.G368A:p. Arg123His in exon 4 of the transthyretin gene in a heterozygous state, consistent with hereditary TTR amyloidosis (hATTR).

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the TTR gene was extracted successfully.
